gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: NERACOOS Gulf of Maine Ocean Array: Realtime Buoy Observations: A01 Massachusetts Bay: A01 DOPPLER Massachusetts Bay

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Department of Physical Oceanography, School of Marine Sciences, University of Maine

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Ocean observation data from the Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal & Ocean Observing Systems (NERACOOS). The NERACOOS region includes the northeast United States and Canadian Maritime provinces, as part of the United States Integrated Ocean Observing System (IOOS). These data are served by Unidata's Thematic Realtime Environmental Distributed Data Services (THREDDS) Data Server (TDS) in a variety of interoperable data services and output formats.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: NERACOOS is funded through the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), is a Regional Association within the U.S. Integrated Ocean Observing System (IOOS). The ocean buoys operated by the University of Maine recieve partial funding from NERACOOS

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Department of Physical Oceanography, School of Marine Sciences, University of Maine

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Oceans > Ocean Pressure > Sea Level Pressure
Oceans > Ocean Waves > Significant Wave Height
Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems (NERACOOS)

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: These data were generated as part of an academic research project, and the principal investigator, Neal Pettigrew (nealp@umaine), asks to be informed of intent for scientific use and appropriate acknowledgment given in any publications arising therefrom. The data are provided free of charge, without warranty of any kind.

ncrcat -d time,2452057.0,2452774.1255 A01.doppler.historical.nc newdop.nc 11-Oct-2003 13:24:24: Provisionally appended A0106 realtime data. 28-Jul-2003 16:52:14: A0105 ''accidentally'' recovered by USCG Willow on 2003-05-14 03:00:00. Cables were cut and deep instruments sent to Davie Jones' Locker. 28-Jul-2003 16:49:58: Appended offically blessed A0105 data from A0105.doppler.post-recovery.nc. Mon Jul 28 16:46:55 2003: ncrcat old_A01.doppler.historical.nc A0105.doppler.post-recovery.nc A01.doppler.historical.nc Mon Jul 28 16:46:35 2003: ncatted -a add_offset,,d,, old_A01.doppler.historical.nc Mon Jul 28 16:46:30 2003: ncatted -a scale_factor,,d,, old_A01.doppler.historical.nc 27-Jun-2003 13:01:41: Added ancillary_variables, intent attributes for CF compliance. 08-Apr-2003 14:44:45: Velocities below effective water depth marked with quality flag 3. 07-Apr-2003 15:55:43: Moved temperature back to celsius. Moved current_u, current_v, up back to cm/s. 26-Mar-2003 16:46:07: Scaled data to match required CF attributes.
